subSubSection.paragraph: ≡ Agrostis alpina Scop., Fl. Carniol. ed. 2, 1: 60. 1772 ≡ Agraulus alpinus (Scop.) P. Beauv., Ess. Agrostogr.: 5. 1812 ≡ Agrestis alpina (Scop.) Bubani, Fl. Pyren. 4: 287. 1901. Type: "Habitat in Alpibus Vochinensibus" and "HALL Hist. n. 1477", SCHEUCHZ. Gram pag. 140, Prodr. P. 22, tab. 4, fig. 1.", original material: In siccioribus Alpium Helveticarum & Rhaeticarum pratis, J. Scheuchzer s.n. (lectotype, designated here : W-18890240472 [image!]. fig. 2
